content.text: I am from Pittsburgh!
Oh cool! I live in Pittsburgh and I am a lifeguard.
I don't like skiing, but I love spending time outdoors. I like to film wildlife. What do you like to do outside?
I enjoy taking pictures of the city. I also like to swim.
I used to swim competitively, but I had to quit because of an injury.
Oh, that is too bad. I love swimming. It's a great way to stay in shape.
Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets. I wish I did, but I am not home enough to take care of one.
I have a cat. His name is Mittens. He's a little bit of a troublemaker, but I love him.
I like cats. They are so cute.
What do you do for work?
I am a teacher. I teach elementary school.
That sounds like a fun job. I bet you get to meet a lot of interesting kids.
I do. I love my students. They are the best part of my job.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and go out with my friends.
Sounds like you have a lot of interests.
I do. I like to keep busy.
I am the same way. I like to have a lot of different things to do.
I think it's important to stay active and have fun.
I agree. It's important to have a balance in life.
I think we are going to get along great.
I think so too.
